attributes.action: The government to formally recognise that Love is all You Need
attributes.additional_details: homophobia, racism, sexism, abuse, circumcision etc
attributes.background: With the globe becoming increasingly insular and right wing it is time for Britain to take a stand and remove all legislation that's attempts to control it's citizens private lives as long as they exist within the boundaries of consent and free will

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
